description: A high severity event has occurred. Windows Defender detected a Trojan (Trojan:Win32/Wacatac.A!ml) on the local computer. The malware was found in the file path: C:\Users\Josso\AppData\Local\AwesomeMiner\claymores_dual_ethereum_amd_nvidia_gpu_miner_v15.0_1\Claymore's Dual Ethereum AMD+NVIDIA GPU Miner v15.0\EthDcrMiner64.exe. The detection source is real-time protection, and the process name is C:\Program Files (x86)\Kaspersky Lab\Kaspersky 21.15\avp.exe.

High severity SIEM alert: Windows Defender detected malware HackTool:Win64/Meterpreter.A!dll on computer Jossovich. The malware is located in the metasploit directory and was detected by real-time protection.
